channel.title: I cant connect to my server and neither can anyone else!
channel.description:
im using the exrendum base, ive port fowarded the 43594 port and ive made a no ip on my router ip adress, ive also changed the gui on the client im trying to connect to's to that no-ip adress.
but i cant connect and other people cant connect either can anyone help? am i missing something?

item.title: I cant connect to my server and neither can anyone else!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:14, topic:297506”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=393544.msg2929058#msg2929058 date=1251161588]

It works for a few, for some it doesn’t. (Doesn’t work on Vista too often. Vista’s just a big heap of fail)

Thanks Terd.
[/quote]

Don’t flame me for posting the truth; Vista doesn’t like running a lot of stuff (properly ~ Optional word) that relates to rsps… It’s the lesser half of the Windows XP, with a much smoother appeal in a compact state. So… It’s matter of truth vs. fact, and they both matter.[/quote]

i know that Cant take a Joke? And yeah it runs Smooth on vista i’ve had multiple servers on windows vista it’s fine.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant connect to my server and neither can anyone else!

item.title: I cant connect to my server and neither can anyone else!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:13, topic:297506”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=393544.msg2928650#msg2928650 date=1251148709]
It works for a few, for some it doesn’t. (Doesn’t work on Vista too often. Vista’s just a big heap of fail)
[/quote]
Thanks Terd.[/quote]

Don’t flame me for posting the truth; Vista doesn’t like running a lot of stuff (properly ~ Optional word) that relates to rsps… It’s the lesser half of the Windows XP, with a much smoother appeal in a compact state. So… It’s matter of truth vs. fact, and they both matter.

item.title: I cant connect to my server and neither can anyone else!
item.dc:creator: @G0dz_Tank G0dz Tank
item.description:
@G0dz_Tank wrote:

port forwarding can be really easy for some? and yet extremly beyond compilcated for others. the incredibly easy way to do it only an idiot can mess this up is to download utorrent click at the top “preferences” the cog and then click connections set the listening port to 43594 and UNCHECK “enable UPnP port mapping” UNCHECK “randomize port each start”
leave the other 2 checked and DONT RIGHT ANYTHING AT THE BOTTOM. happy Hosting

Read full topic
item.source: I cant connect to my server and neither can anyone else!

item.title: I cant connect to my server and neither can anyone else!
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

YOU have to connect to your localhost which is 127.0.0.1

OTHER PLAYERS have to connect to you’re no-ip.

This explains why you cant log in

Read full topic
